nOq dvEShTiq taM ~MvAqM jaMBE# dadhAmyEqtA vai dEqvatA# aqgniM ciqta(gm) ra#kShantiq tAByOq yadAhu#tIqrna ju#huqyAda#ddhvaqryuM caq yaja#mAnaM ca dhyAyEyuqryadEqtA Ahu#tIrjuqhOti# BAgaqdhEyE#nai-vaiqnA$~jCamayatiq nA&&*rtiqmArcCa#tyaddhvaqryurna yaja#mAnO hEqtayOq nAma# sthaq tEShA$M ~MvaH puqrO gRuqhA aqgnirvaq iSha#vaH 
saliqlO ni#liqpAM nAma# - [  ] 44
